sn34.46-49:1.3: samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo …
sn34.46-49:1.4: neva samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo …
sn34.46-49:1.5: samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo ca …
sn34.46-49:1.6: seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṃ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34.46-49:1.7: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ …pe…
sn34.46-49:2.1: Chacattālīsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī …pe….
sn34.46-49:3.1: Sattacattālīsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī …pe….
sn34.46-49:4.1: Aṭṭhacattālīsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī …pe….
